statements: UPDATE social_media_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Like' WHERE user_id = 'b5741e79-88b3-443b-b7fb-334d1dc42c6f' AND post_id = 'eb356aa1-883f-4e75-b4a7-68f1046bf92d';

UPDATE post_engagement SET likes_count = likes_count + 1, comments_count = comments_count + 2 WHERE post_id = 456;

UPDATE posts SET post_date = '2022-01-01 09:00:00' WHERE post_id = 3;
